speaker: President. −
english: President. − Thank you, David. I assure you that I will convey to the Bureau your request concerning additional human resources for the work of the petitions secretariat.
original: President. − Thank you, David. I assure you that I will convey to the Bureau your request concerning additional human resources for the work of the petitions secretariat.
agenda_item: Report on the deliberations of the Committee on Petitions during the year 2006 (debate)
